content: Jihadis are capable of beheading civilians, murdering children and raping defenceless women, but when it comes to fighting a military force they don't want to know, and they come back here to their comfortable homes with their tails between their legs.
translations: ita:I jihadisti sono in grado di decapitare i civili, uccidere i bambini e violentare le donne indifese, ma quando si tratta
